greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Difference between A005187 and its Möbius transform (A297111).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..16384
mathematica: Table[IntegerExponent[(2 n)!, 2] - DivisorSum[n, IntegerExponent[(2 #)!, 2] MoebiusMu[n/#] &], {n, 95}] (* or *)

Fold[Function[{a, n}, Append[a, {Abs@ Total@ Map[MoebiusMu[n/#] a[[#, -1]] &, Most@ Divisors@ n], IntegerExponent[(2 n)!, 2]}]], {{0, 1}}, Range[2, 95]][[All, 1]] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Mar 10 2018 *)
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Mar 10 2018
